overview: Deception, retribution, and violence all come down to this tale of Greed and Fate. Oregon, 4 members of a drug association play a high-stake cash game of poker, only to find out too late the assumed winner cheated through the game and got away with their priceless golden bar. Following the adventure of Snider Snyder (Victor M. Smith) and George Tadeshi (Johnny McNown) as they attempt to track down Damien JJ Wilson (Jordan Juang) and retrieve the stolen riches while taking down Damien in the process
tagline: "Money changes people. It makes them Greedy"
title: Greed and Fate - Short Film
